dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: I decided to not continue pressing the issue, and clearly Lucci didn’t want to continue talking about it, so I decided to leave it at that.

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: Well whatever your reasons are...maybe you should think more about why you are doing these things...and well if they are really worth, because I don’t want this world to be put into turmoil...

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: Lucci awkwardly looked towards the floor before she let a lonely look crawl across her face. She looked like a wounded animal.

dialogue.name: Lucci
dialogue.dialogueText: I...wish I had more of a choice than this...

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: Lucci’s face changed to her usual reaction, but before we could continue her phone rang and after answering it she looked quite annoyed.

dialogue.name: Lucci
dialogue.dialogueText: U-um...sorry Takeshi-Kun...can we talk later? I need to go take care of this!

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: Lucci then ran off on her own.
